expression.query: <gui><executable> <category>Add Fiducial</category> <title>Add a Fiducial</title> <description> Here you can add a fiducial to the scene! </description> <version>1.0</version> <documentation-url></documentation-url> <license></license> <contributor>Michael Keilhack</contributor> <parameters> <label>Fiducial Parameters</label> <description> Adjust the fiducial parameters that should be added! </description> <string> <name>fidName</name> <flag>s</flag> <longflag>string</longflag> <description>Fiducial name</description> <label>Fiducial name</label> <default></default> </string> <integer> <name>fidX</name> <flag>i</flag> <longflag>integer</longflag> <description> X-coordinate </description> <label>Fiducial x-coordinate</label> <default>0</default> </integer> <integer> <name>fidY</name> <flag>i</flag> <longflag>integer</longflag> <description> Y-coordinate </description> <label>Fiducial y-coordinate</label> <default>0</default> </integer> <integer> <name>fidZ</name> <flag>i</flag> <longflag>integer</longflag> <description> Z-coordinate </description> <label>Fiducial z-coordinate</label> <default>0</default> </integer> </parameters> </executable></gui>

<tclValidationFunc>proc validate {names values} { set retval true; set errorList {}; foreach name $names value $values { set errorMSG {}; switch $name { fidName { if {$value == {}} {set errorMSG {The Fiducial name is not set!}} } }; lappend errorList $errorMSG; if {[string compare $errorMSG {}] != 0} {set retval false}; }; if {$retval != true} {return $errorList} else {return $retval}; }</tclValidationFunc>

<gui><executable> <category>Add Fiducial</category> <title>Add a Fiducial</title> <description> Here you can add a fiducial to the scene! </description> <version>1.0</version> <documentation-url></documentation-url> <license></license> <contributor>Michael Keilhack</contributor> <parameters> <label>Fiducial Parameters</label> <description> Adjust the fiducial parameters that should be added! </description> <string> <name>fidName</name> <flag>s</flag> <longflag>string</longflag> <description>Fiducial name</description> <label>Fiducial name</label> <default></default> </string> <integer> <name>fidX</name> <flag>i</flag> <longflag>integer</longflag> <description> X-coordinate </description> <label>Fiducial x-coordinate</label> <default>0</default> </integer> <integer> <name>fidY</name> <flag>i</flag> <longflag>integer</longflag> <description> Y-coordinate </description> <label>Fiducial y-coordinate</label> <default>0</default> </integer> <integer> <name>fidZ</name> <flag>i</flag> <longflag>integer</longflag> <description> Z-coordinate </description> <label>Fiducial z-coordinate</label> <default>0</default> </integer> </parameters> </executable></gui>

<tclValidationFunc>proc validate {names values} { set retval true; set errorList {}; foreach name $names value $values { set errorMSG {}; switch $name { fidName { if {$value == {}} {set errorMSG {The Fiducial name is not set!}} } }; lappend errorList $errorMSG; if {[string compare $errorMSG {}] != 0} {set retval false}; }; if {$retval != true} {return $errorList} else {return $retval}; }</tclValidationFunc>
